prompts: Create a small, ground-type Pokemon that resembles a desert animal with sandy colors.
I want a Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a playful personality.
Generate an image of a cute, yellow Pokemon that thrives in sandy habitats.
Make a Pokemon that has a round body shape and is known for its stealthy movements.
Imagine a small, adorable creature with a bright yellow coat and sharp claws.
Design a Pokemon that is agile and prefers to live in arid environments.
Show me a Pokemon that has a sturdy build and is skilled in defensive tactics.
